Package com.bmc.arsys.apitransport.connection

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ApiProxyManagerI
    Interface for Proxy Managers, pooling or none pooling
    ApiProxyPoolI
    Interface for a proxy pool
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApiCMTKey
    This class holds the client managed DB transaction handler and associated info for the proxy.
    ApiCMTObject
    The object, which will be put in cmtPool and used for CMT transaction
    ApiCMTProxyHolder
    Hold a proxy and associate info used in CMT
    ApiCMTProxyPool
    This pool contains proxies that assigned to client management DB transaction, which needs to be set to the same server.
    ApiDefaultProxyAbstractManager
    This is a internal class.
    ApiProxyFactory
    This is a internal class.
    ApiProxyManager
    This proxy manager has the ability to age-out pooled proxy and pools based on settings.
    ApiProxyManagerTask  
    ApiProxyPool
    This class provides many adjustable parameters to dynamically changing the pool size.
